Wealthy property investor arrested in Auckland after Ferrari incident - but describes separate firearms charge as ‘farce’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wealthy-property-investor-arrested-in-auckland-after-ferrari-incident-but-describes-separate-firearms-charge-as-farce/74NWNM6SYRA4RPMU665S5Z5S6I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wealthy-property-investor-arrested-in-auckland-after-ferrari-incident-but-describes-separate-firearms-charge-as-farce/74NWNM6SYRA4RPMU665S5Z5S6I/ The man is also on domestic violence charges, Herald inquiries reveal. Sun, 02 Jun 2024 17:00:33 +0000 The man was picked up by police last month in Auckland after driving a Ferrari that had been reported stolen. It's understood the report stemmed from a dispute over a loan and police have not pursued charges relating to the car. Photo / Getty Images
